sources.name: sourceEmp
sources.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Phone as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceEmp

sinks.name: sinkTgt
sinks.script:
sourceEmp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sinkTgt
